Get the names of all loon display options

Source: R/l_getOption.R
l_getOptionNames.Rd

All of loon's displays access a set of common options. This function accesses and returns the names of all loon options.

l_getOptionNames()

Value

a vector of all loon display option names.

See also

l_getOption, l_userOptions, l_userOptionDefault, l_setOption

Examples

l_getOptionNames()
#>  [1] "linewidth"                      "defaultMetaTempMove"           
#>  [3] "metaMulSel"                     "default-font"                  
#>  [5] "guidelines"                     "guidesBackground"              
#>  [7] "colors-palette-hcl"             "brush_color"                   
#>  [9] "export_ps_font"                 "size"                          
#> [11] "select-color"                   "font-xlabel"                   
#> [13] "glyph"                          "ticks_density"                 
#> [15] "defaultMetaMulSel"              "font-title"                    
#> [17] "printConfigureDebug"            "fixed_guide_distance"          
#> [19] "font"                           "image_sizes"                   
#> [21] "background"                     "printInConfigurationWarningMsg"
#> [23] "abbreviations"                  "colors"                        
#> [25] "printInConfigurationWarning"    "image_scale"                   
#> [27] "metaKeys"                       "foreground"                    
#> [29] "noscrollInspector"              "metaTempMove"                  
#> [31] "canvas_bg_guides"               "tick_length"                   
#> [33] "font-text_glyph"                "brush_color_handle"            
#> [35] "font-ylabel"                    "colors-palette"                
#> [37] "size_0_rect"                    "font-scales"                   
#> [39] "color"
